title: Is it an ad hominem fallacy to suggest Donald Trump suffers from narcissistic personality disorder? - Quora

response.answer_text: There does seem to be a considerable volume of evidence to support this. Trump exhibits all the behaviors directly associated with malignant narcissism, major and minor. The tragedy is that almost everyone is unaware of what a narcissist is like until they’ve been through the mill with one and it would seem that Trump is their first, so vast numbers of US citizens have bought into his bullshit.

No, an ad hominem fallacy would be, for example, if Trump were to argue a position on the merits, and someone tried to declare the argument invalid because he suffers from narcissistic personality disorder. To suggest simply that he has such a condition is nothing more than a statement of opinion.
